name: Skull Beach - Demo
description:
Welcome to the SKULL BEACH! YOU are a treasure hunter, searching for lost pirates and their treasure. Find all sorts of things along the way and collect points. But watch out, something is not quite right...

CONTROLS: How to play: WASD (or ARROW KEYS) for movement and SPACE BAR for digging.

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING! I want to develop this game further and all FEEDBACK and SUGGESTIONS are welcome and highly appreciated.
